Skip to the content.

Gitector 🔎

Linter for your commits

View on GitHub Get docker

Check your commits not only code

Compare all changes in your branch

Use markdown formatter

Usage

CLI

Edit file .git/COMMIT_EDITMSG and put inside

gitector -di

Github Actions

Gitlab

Add to your gitlab-ci.yml

stages:
  - gitector
  - build
  - deploy

before_script:
  - wget link > gitector

gitector:
  image: gitector/gitector
  script:
    - git fetch
    - gitector
  only:
    refs:
      - merge_requests
      - master
      - web
gitector.github.io is maintained by gitector. Made with ❤️ in Berlin.
